划.definition: to row; to paddle; profitable; worth (the effort); it pays (to do sth)

划子.definition: rowboat; small boat; oar; paddle; thin rod used to control a curtain etc

划算.definition: to calculate; to weigh (pros and cons); to view as profitable; worthwhile; value for money; cost-effective

划船.definition: to row a boat; rowing; boating; small boat
